network.author: Intel Corporation
network.description: Provides boolean packets after connect or disconnect from network

in_ports.description: Which interface should be monitored (it MUST be a regexp - so if you want a exact match with a name, use '^name$')
in_ports.name: ADDRESS

network.name: network/boolean

members.description: Which interface should be monitored (it MUST be a regexp - so if you want a exact match with a name, use '^name$')
members.name: address

out_ports.description: A boolean packet when network changes. If it's connect true, otherwise false.
out_ports.name: OUT
